score: 1 out of 3 people found the following review useful
review: This is the greatest movie by Steve Martin AND Eddie Murphy.  However, it's nowhere near the greatest movie by Steve Martin OR Eddie Murphy.Before you look it up, this is their only joint feature-film project.
